meta.description: Optimize daily meal plan to fulfill nutritional intake while minimizing expenses.

sets.name: FOODS
sets.description: Different food items available for the meal plan.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content of each food item in grams.

params.name: carbohydrates
params.description: Carbohydrate content of each food item in grams.

params.name: calories
params.description: Calorie content of each food item.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of servings of each food item.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of the meal plan.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 68 grams of protein are consumed.

constraints.name: carbohydrate_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carbohydrates[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 151 grams of carbohydrates are consumed.

constraints.name: calorie_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calories[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1900 calories are consumed.
